name: ShootingTracker
0:
”Alexa open Shooting Tracker”
”Alexa ask Shooting Tracker when was the last mass shooting”
”Alexa ask Shooting Tracker was there a mass shooting recently in the United States”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: shooting tracker
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Ask Shooting Tracker for information on the most recent mass shooting in the United States.

After enabling this skill, just say, "Alexa, ask Shooting Tracker for information on the most recent mass shooting."

A mass shooting as an incident where four or more people are shot in a single shooting spree. This may include the gunman himself, or police shootings of civilians around the gunman.

The data is crowd sourced from the Mass Shooting Tracker and available at: https://www.massshootingtracker.org/
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
